org.arl.fjage.shell

Class ShellExecReq

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arl.fjage.Message
      • org.arl.fjage.shell.ShellExecReq
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ShellExecReq
extends Message
    Request to execute shell command/script.
    See Also:

        public boolean isScript()
